message_1: A game has 10 rounds, each round consists of rolling an 8-sided die. What is the probability of getting at least one 8 in all 10 rounds?
message_2:
To find the probability of getting at least one 8 in all 10 rounds, we can first find the probability of not getting an 8 in any of the rounds and then subtract that from 1.

The probability of not getting an 8 in a single round is 7/8 (since there are 7 other outcomes). Since each round is independent, the probability of not getting an 8 in all 10 rounds is (7/8)^10.

Now, to find the probability of getting at least one 8 in all 10 rounds, we subtract the probability of not getting an 8 in any round from 1:
